      • execute

        public R execute()
          throws java.lang.Throwable
        This method does not perform any tasks for Cloud tasks. A Cloud task just needs to implement this method because it extends TaskInfo.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • executeCloudTask

        public void executeCloudTask()
        This is the method that actually needs to be implemented by every cloud task for executing its task.
